  24. class NavigationNode(object):
  26. def __init__(self, title, url, id, parent_id=None, parent_namespace=None, attr=None, visible=True):

  45. def _remove_current_root(self, url):
  46. current_root = "/%s/" % get_language()
  47. if url[:len(current_root)] == current_root:
  48. url = url[len(current_root) - 1:]
  49. return url

  60. def get_descendants(self):
  61. nodes = []
  62. for node in self.children:
  63. nodes.append(node)
  64. nodes += node.get_descendants()

  67. def get_ancestors(self):
  68. nodes = []

  70. nodes.append(self.parent)
  71. nodes += self.parent.get_ancestors()
